hero_title: Learn to Read Quran from Zero in 2 Months
hero_subtitle: Get quality education at your convenient time and place. Modern technologies for quality knowledge.
about_section_subtitle: Muhib Academy - 10 years of experience in Quran and Arabic language education
about_description: In our academy, you will learn Quran reading, Arabic language, and Islamic knowledge using modern methods. Qualified teachers, convenient schedule, and quality education are guaranteed.
feature_1_desc: Teachers with 10+ years of experience and international certificates
feature_2_desc: Zoom, video lessons and interactive platforms
feature_3_desc: Lesson schedule adapted to your time
feature_4_desc: Each student's level is taken into account
feature_5_desc: Ability to review and repeat lessons
feature_6_desc: Fast and quality answers to your questions
testimonial_1_text: Thanks to Muhib Academy, I learned to read Quran in 3 months. Teachers are very qualified and patient.
testimonial_2_text: Great help in learning Arabic. Modern methods and quality materials.
testimonial_3_text: Gave me the opportunity to study at my own time. Results are very good.
testimonial_4_text: Professional approach and individual attention. I recommend!
testimonial_5_text: Best academy for learning Quran reading. Thank you!

enrollment_success: Successfully sent! We will contact you soon.
faq_1_question: How long does it take to learn to read Quran?
faq_1_answer: On average, basic skills can be mastered in 2-3 months. This depends on the student's level and effort.
faq_2_answer: Lessons are conducted live through Zoom platform. Video lesson archive is also available.
faq_3_answer: Monthly payment system. First lesson is free trial.
faq_4_answer: All necessary materials are provided digitally with constant support.
faq_5_answer: Yes, both individual and group lessons are available. Can be chosen based on student needs.
